desc.zh: oeDeploy目前提供了两个MCP Server。mcp-oedp提供oedp基本命令的MCP调用；mcp-make-oedp-plugin自动完成一个oeDeploy插件开发。
desc.en: The tool oeDeploy currently provides 2 MCP Servers. Tool mcp-oedp provides MCP calls for basic oedp commands. Tool mcp-make-oedp-plugin automatically completes the development of an oeDeploy plugin.

desc.zh: gitMcp 提供了Git相关操作的MCP服务，包括仓库管理、分支操作、提交推送、差异比较等功能。
desc.en: The tool gitMcp provides MCP services for Git-related operations, including repository management, branch operations, commit push, diff comparison and other functions.

desc.zh: oeGitExt 提供了管理 openEuler 社区 issue、repos、PR 和 project 的 MCP 服务。
desc.en: The tool oeGitExt provides MCP services for managing openEuler community issues, repos, PRs, and projects.
